try_again_message: From here you can try again
bouns-modal-info: Order the verses before the time and get 15 points
verses: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want
Trust in the Lord with all your heart
For God so loved the world
We love because He first loved us
I can do all things through Christ
bounsVerses: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart and lean not unto thine own understanding
In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth
If I forget thee O Jerusalem let my right hand forget her cunning
The Lord is my shepherd I shall not want
O Lord rebuke me not in thine anger neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure
Preserve me O God for in thee do I put my trust
I will love thee O Lord my strength
The heavens declare the glory of God and the firmament sheweth his handywork
The earth is the Lords and the fulness thereof the world and they that dwell therein
Unto thee O Lord do I lift up my soul
I will bless the Lord at all times his praise shall continually be in my mouth
I waited patiently for the Lord and he inclined unto me and heard my cry
Blessed is he that considereth the poor the Lord will deliver him in time of trouble
God is our refuge and strength a very present help in trouble
Make a joyful noise unto God all ye lands
He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty
Make a joyful noise unto the Lord all the earth
Serve the Lord with gladness come before his presence with singing
O give thanks unto the Lord for he is good for his mercy endureth for ever
I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills from whence cometh my help
I was glad when they said unto me Let us go into the house of the Lord
Out of the depths have I cried unto thee O Lord
Behold how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity
He healeth the broken in heart and bindeth up their wounds
info: Did you know that Jesus had 12 disciples
Did you know that Jesus sent out 70 apostles
Did you know the first book of the Bible is Genesis
